revision.text:
==Description== The [[Underground]] is unlocked when you purchase the [[Explorer Kit]] located in [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cinnabar Island Shop]]. It also has its own currency called [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} that can be used to purchase upgrades for the Underground or [[Masterball]] at the [[Shops|Pokémon League]]. For more information about the Underground, open it by clicking on it after you purchased the [[Explorer Kit]] and click on the '''Help''' tab. ==Upgrades== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Upgrade !! Effect/lvl !! Max Lvl || Cost !! Total Cost !! Max Effect !! Total at Max Lvl |- | Max Energy || +10 Energy|| 10 || 50*lvl || style="text-align: right;"| 2,750 {{Diamonds}} || +100 Max Energy || 150 Max Energy |- | Max Items || +1 Item|| 4 || 200*lvl || style="text-align: right;"| 2,000 {{Diamonds}} || +4 Max Items || 7 Max Items |- | Energy Restored || +1 Energy|| 17 || 100*lvl || style="text-align: right;"| 15,300 {{Diamonds}} || +17 Energy Restored || 20 Energy Restored |- | Energy Regen Time || -1 second || 20 || 20*lvl || style="text-align: right;"| 4,200 {{Diamonds}} || -20 Seconds || 40 Seconds per Restore |- | Daily Deals || +1 Deal|| 2 || 150*lvl || style="text-align: right;"| 450 {{Diamonds}} || +2 Daily Deals || 5 Daily Deals |- | Bomb Efficiency || +2 || 5 || 50*lvl || style="text-align: right;"| 750 {{Diamonds}} || +10 Bomb Efficiency || 20 Bomb Efficiency |} ==Items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! ==Efficiency== [[File:Mining_efficiency.png]] To find Underground items most efficiently, use the chisel to mine the green tiles first, followed by yellow, then red. Items will never spawn in the outermost row of tiles, so they should be avoided.

==Description== The [[Underground]] is unlocked when you purchase the [[Explorer Kit]] located in [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cinnabar Island Shop]]. It also has its own currency called [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} that can be used to purchase upgrades for the Underground or [[Masterball]] at the [[Shops|Pokémon League]]. For more information about the Underground, open it by clicking on it after you purchased the [[Explorer Kit]] and click on the '''Help''' tab.

==Efficiency==
[[File:Mining_efficiency.png]]
To find Underground items most efficiently, use the chisel to mine the green tiles first, followed by yellow, then red.
Items will never spawn in the outermost row of tiles, so they should be avoided.
